text: Christos Wheeler (born 29 June 1997) is a Cypriot professional footballer who plays for APOEL as a left back. ==International career== He made his debut for Cyprus national football team on 19 November 2019 in a Euro 2020 qualifier against Belgium. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Karmiotissa FC players Category:AEL Limassol players Category:APOEL FC players Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Cyprus youth international footballers Category:Cyprus under-21 international footballers Category:Cyprus international footballers Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Cypriot people of American descent
title: Christos Wheeler
